name: JSHint for Chrome Dev Tools
tagline: A JSHint Chrome Developer Tools Extension for the Sources tab
body:
The extension will automatically run JSHint on JavaScript sources saved
in Chrome Dev Tools.

Unfortunately this extension uses currently experimental APIs, so cannot
be released on the Chrome App Store. You can download it [here](jshint-extension.crx).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
